name: Laundry Services
description: MNRC has laundry machines available for people experiencing homelessness. - Cost is 25 cents per load How to Apply: - Drop-in during open hours (first come first serve) Open Hours: - Monday through Wednesday: 7AM to 7PM - Thursday: 7AM to 5PM - Friday: 7AM to 7PM - Saturday: 7AM to 12PM Service Contact Information: - Email: info@mnhc.org
